interest_drivers: Collaboration between Intel and Weizmann Institute
ai_analysis.summary: Intel and Weizmann Institute have made a significant technical advance in speculative decoding, enabling small 'draft' models to accelerate large language models (LLMs) regardless of vocabulary differences, with potential business impact through improved AI performance and collaboration.
